article_title: Doctors May Soon Be Paid For Not Making You Wait

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: More doctor pay is being tied to patient satisfaction metrics, another sign health care may be coming more consumer-friendly, according to a new national analysis of physician compensation.
